content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. Let's focus on the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for my apartment? Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Considering the condition and location of the apartment, I am willing to pay 500 euros.
